change_orders.title: Additional Elevator Shaft Fireproofing
change_orders.description: Owner requested additional fireproofing in elevator shafts per new fire marshal requirements
change_orders.justification: Required by updated fire code for high-rise buildings

change_orders.title: Upgraded HVAC Controls System
change_orders.description: Upgrade to smart building automation system for energy efficiency
change_orders.justification: Owner requested upgrade for LEED certification and operating cost reduction

change_orders.title: Premium Lobby Finishes
change_orders.description: Upgrade lobby finishes from standard to premium materials
change_orders.justification: Owner upgrade to attract premium tenants

change_orders.title: Rooftop Solar Panel Infrastructure
change_orders.description: Add structural support and electrical infrastructure for future solar installation
change_orders.justification: Owner wants future solar capability without roof modifications

change_orders.title: Delete Alternate Paving Option
change_orders.description: Remove decorative paving upgrade, use standard concrete
